title: FUKING NERF MUNDO RIOT
body: WHEN HELL ARE YOU GOING TO NERF MUNDO RIOT

replies.body:
there are nerfs on the PBE lol 

he was good for not even 2 weeks and his performance tends to drop the higher you go
already happening genius, perhaps you should google and do some research before you shitpost?

http://champion.gg/champion/DrMundo/Top?

Poor Mundo ppl complain about him being good for 1 patch

Riot just buffed mundo because he is utter garbage.

In case that is too hard for you, the answer is they wont nerf him any time soon.
run darius or garen with ignite into him. the moment he presses his r, you press yours.

For real, I build grievous wounds and his healing is still greater than my damage output and I'm fed as fuck. Grievous wounds -> he ults from 30% hp and he still just gets to full hp, with the entire team on him. What the fuck is this.

A juggernaut is good for one patch and riot is immediately nerfing him next patch.
Meanwhile {{champion:40}} had a 57% winrate and 35% pickrate for 4 months and riot did nothing.
